Beautiful Flowers for Any Occasion Most elegant, freshly cut floral arrangements

We Are Flowery Love

We are a small yet professional flower studio based in New York. Our mission is to make your lives brighter and beautiful, help you impress guests during important events, and make your loved ones happy with wonderful bouquets and flower arrangements through a trouble-free process. We work with freshly cut flowers to create elegant compositions.

Services

We offer a variety of floral services, from unique bouquets to event decoration.

Decoration

We create elegant flower decorations for homes, offices, shops, and other locations. Contact us if you want to demonstrate your style and taste to your guests, clients or visitors.

Floral Design

Our design team is always here to arrange unique and beautiful bouquets and flower compositions. Hurry up to surprise your loved ones and add some personal touch to your gifts.

Events

We know that details matter. That's why we provide and arrange flowers for private and corporate celebrations, charity galas, product launches, and other important events. Come to us to make your event an all-time memory.

Events We Serve

Special Flower Collections

Need to pick a gift for a specific event? We can help you even if you are short of time. Our special flower collections are always available for those, who enjoy stylish ready-made designs and fast yet beautiful solutions.

Mother's Day Collection

One of the best and the most elegant ways to show your mother how much you love her is to present her a beautiful flower composition. Choose the colors along with the flowers and place your order to make this year's Mother's Day unforgettable.

Order Now

Valentine's Day Collection

Roses are red, violets are blue, our flower collections are here for you! If you're looking for a unique gift to your loved one, check out this fantastic collection. It'll help you make Valentine's Day really special!

Order Now

Christmas Collection

Christmas is a busy season, but we've got your back. Order bouquets from this beautiful special collection and focus on picking the presents to match them, while we'll arrange the flowers for you.

Order Now
